name: Yahima Fumero
bio: Yahima is a co-founder of Cloud39 Corp. She co-organizes GDG Cloud Miami and is a WTM Ambassador.

name: Jesus Diaz
bio: Jesus is a co-founder of Cloud39 Corp. He  co-organizes GDG Cloud Miami, is a Google Certified Cloud Architect and Google Certified Data Engineer.

name: Layla Bouzoubaa
bio: Layla is a statistical programmer for the University of Miami Sylvester Comprehensive Cancer Center. Originally from Atlanta, Layla is a freshly transplanted Miamian and co-organizes R-Ladies Miami, a Women Techmakers ambassador, and a wannabe wine connoisseur.

name: César Díez
bio: Cesar Diez Sanchez is a Senior Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience in Android development. Software Crafter apprentice. Usability and design lover. Forever curious learner. Tomato and olive oil seeker. Into cinema, soccer and running.

name: Farzad Barzin
bio: Farzad is a Full-stack Software Engineer at BEX Realty where he has been developing a mobile application for real estate agents using Flutter. He is also one of the organizers of GDG Miami.
